location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Lieutenant Colonel Edward Baker, Commissary General, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, informs Lieutenant Colonel Edward Baker, Commissary General, Bombay, that in compliance with a requisition forwarded by Captain James Thomas Molesworth, he has directed that twenty-four candies of gypsum be shipped on board the East India Company ship, the Discovery,for the use of the Commissariat Department. Stannus encloses a bill for the shipment (not included).
